components.html:
Your work is not saved yet.  
Use the link in the email within [% module.savereturn.config#emailTokenDuration %] hours to save your work.

For your security, we will delete your work if you don’t confirm your email address in this time.

### Didn’t receive the email?

If you haven’t received the email after a few minutes:
- check your spam or junk folders
- check you have entered the correct email address
- [resend the email]([% url:return.setup.email %])

lede: We have sent an email to {email}.
heading: Check your email
